title: In Despair
description: Isaac Porter out to kidnap the only who woman he has ever loved Aliyah Green. Having felt the sting of rejection for the first time in his life, he wants to make her suffer as she made him suffer. In Despair follows the struggles between Isaac and Aliyah and the obstacles in their way. Is Aliyah able to overcome his overbearing, over possessive nature? Or will she try everything in her power on escaping her captor who is hell bent on making her his.  Warning: This is an adults only book. Recommended for mature audiences aged 18 years and over. It contains material of sex and submission and violence. If this material offends, please refrain from reading.
author: E.L. Beth
